name: CaseInsensitiveMapTest
description: Unit tests for the CaseInsensitiveMap class, focusing on case insensitivity, cloning, initial capacity, locale independence, null handling, and putAll functionality.

test_cases.name: testCaseInsensitive
test_cases.description: Tests the case insensitivity of the CaseInsensitiveMap by adding keys with different cases and verifying retrieval.

test_cases.name: testClone
test_cases.description: Tests the cloning functionality of the CaseInsensitiveMap by verifying the size and content of the cloned map.

test_cases.name: testInitialCapacityZero
test_cases.description: Tests the initial capacity of the CaseInsensitiveMap when set to zero.

test_cases.name: testLocaleIndependence
test_cases.description: Tests the locale independence of the CaseInsensitiveMap by verifying case insensitivity across different locales.

test_cases.name: testNullHandling
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of null keys in the CaseInsensitiveMap.

test_cases.name: testPutAll
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll functionality of the CaseInsensitiveMap by verifying the size and content after adding entries from another map.
